r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * 'wikilinks' rule now shows the display text (not the page name) for new pages * 'wikilinks' rule only shows a new-page link when new_url is set and non-blank * re-enabled 'newline' rule after changing the regex; use space-underscore at the end of a line to indicate a line break * 'paragraph' rule is a bit smarter now, it looks at the surrounding tokens to determine if it should be active or not
